title: Frameworks & Libraries
summary: I utilize frameworks that boost productivity while maintaining flexibility: FastAPI for high-performance Python backends, React for interactive frontends, and Vite for optimized build systems.
content:
My approach to frameworks and libraries focuses on balancing developer productivity with application performance:

  • FastAPI has become my preferred backend framework due to its incredible speed, automatic documentation, and built-in validation. It's particularly well-suited for building modern API services that integrate with LLMs and other AI services.
  • React provides the perfect balance of flexibility and structure for frontend development. I use it with TypeScript to create maintainable and scalable user interfaces with excellent performance characteristics.
  • Vite dramatically improves the development experience with near-instant hot module replacement and optimized builds. It's become an essential tool in my frontend development workflow.

I believe in choosing frameworks that solve specific problems rather than trying to force a one-size-fits-all solution. This approach allows me to leverage the best tools for each aspect of an application while maintaining a cohesive architecture.
